Posts.Content: hi dimplesapril!i had mets to the liver two times, i may be on my third! i just hope you have a dr. as good as mine i call him my angel. there are so many new advances in mets of breast ca. don't get the stage four stuck in your head, it means nothing. what does is your goodÂ pos. outlook and doing everything to stay healthy. good food and working out, and yoga! its amazing, it just takes you away. please respond i have a wealth of info. plus i am in the med field.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Metastasi to The Liver
